Fuzzy Logic

Hello.

I’m Laurence Hughes, a web developer at Greenhill, producer in The Nuclear Family, player of records and pinger of pongs. Fuzzy Logic is my online home, where I test-drive web stuff and ramble about code, music and more.

Elsewhere online

You’ll find me tweeting on Twitter; posting photos on Instagram; on Soundcloud sharing music and mixes; collecting, buying and selling records on Discogs; and coding on Github and CodePen.
